question:
You recently heard about some new jobs at a local department store. You would like to work there. Write a letter to store manager of the department store.
In your letter, 
-Explain how you heard about the job 
-Describe the kind of job you would like to have 
-Give details of your experience and qualifications
text: I m writing this letter regarding a job opening at your store, I would like to apply for a job.

To commence with, I came across your vacancy at your place by one of my friends. As he was passing by queens street, he saw a billboard in regards to job applicants for different designations at one of your departmental outlets.

Additionally, the post of  store manager is still empty in your outlet, I would like to apply for that as I was seeking that post for the past few months. As I also know it requires more effort to manage the staff as well as the stocks.

Apart from this, I have recently persuaded my bachelor's of commerce, I can utilise my knowledge in bookkeeping and stock maintenance. Moreover, I also had an experience in the same as I served at all mart shops in Colaba. Where I grabbed good communication skills with customers.
I look forwards to receiving a positive revert from you soon.
